name: Starry Night (rubsz)
description:
// <Commodore's Log> <October 4 0805> <C. Parzival>

**** **** **** **** **** **** **** **** **** **** **** ****

It's all chaos, my ship has found a wormhole and that might be our best

chance of salvation. If we only had more time before that blasted black hole

devours us I might be able save everyone! I have to repair my ship to venture in this wormhole,

I may yet still enjoy bliss through this catastrophe.

**** **** **** **** **** **** **** **** **** **** **** ****
